rows.label: bf06140100_0010
rows.name: So why did you awaken Kasumi?

rows.label: bf06140100_0020
rows.name: Because her power was of great use to me.

rows.label: bf06140100_0030
rows.name:
Acedia has found itself under attack
from Iira a number of times.

rows.label: bf06140100_0040
rows.name: She was necessary in driving them back.

rows.label: bf06140100_0050
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: bf06140100_0060
rows.name:
Then why don't you seem to have any others?
Blades, that is.

rows.label: bf06140100_0070
rows.name: Heh. Driver though I may be, I am no fighter.

rows.label: bf06140100_0080
rows.name:
Besides, I find the warrior monks here
so reliable. They get the job done.

rows.label: bf06140100_0090
rows.name: Hmm... If you say so.

rows.label: bf06140100_0100
rows.name:
I wonder, do you know why Iira are
using the name of a dead country?

rows.label: bf06140100_0110
rows.name: Shin was a Blade of Iira, once.

rows.label: bf06140100_0120
rows.name:
Loyalty or nostalgia?
Who can say. Perhaps both.

rows.label: bf06140100_0130
rows.name: Is that really all there is to it?

rows.label: bf06140100_0140
rows.name: You don't think so?

rows.label: bf06140100_0150
rows.name:
I don't know much about what
happened while I slept.

rows.label: bf06140100_0160
rows.name:
There are no written records either.
All we have is stories passed down.

rows.label: bf06140100_0170
rows.name: And you think that is insufficient?

rows.label: bf06140100_0180
rows.name:
History is a murky thing. Only those present
can truly know what took place.

rows.label: bf06140100_0190
rows.name: But weren't you one of those present?

rows.label: bf06140100_0200
rows.name: And that is why I offer you my cooperation.
